CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 17,18 Quinacridone ( QC ) derivative , which is known as a red - violet pigment , has a high crystallinity and self - assembled characteristics , so it has drawn significant attention as an OTFT because of its high mobility.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Quinacridone |
| OTFT |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "Quinacridone" and "OTFT". These terms are mentioned as materials in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Quinacridone (QC) derivative |
| OTFT |

In the paragraph, "Quinacridone (QC) derivative" and "OTFT" are the two clear "Material Name" entities. The term "red-violet pigment" is not a specific material name, but rather a description of the Quinacridone derivative. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 17,18 Quinacridone ( QC ) derivative , which is known as a red - violet pigment , has a high crystallinity and self - assembled characteristics , so it has drawn significant attention as an OTFT because of its high mobility.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high crystallinity |
| self-assembled characteristics |
| high mobility |

Explanation:

1. "high crystallinity" - This is a property of the Quinacridone derivative.
2. "self-assembled characteristics" - This is another property of the Quinacridone derivative.
3. "high mobility" - This is a property of the Quinacridone derivative when used as an OTFT (Organic Thin-Film Transistor).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high crystallinity |
| self-assembled characteristics |
| high mobility |

Explanation:

1. "high crystallinity" - This is a material property of the Quinacridone derivative.
2. "self-assembled characteristics" - This is a material property of the Quinacridone derivative.
3. "high mobility" - This is a material property of the Quinacridone derivative when used as an OTFT (Organic Thin-Film Transistor).

The other entities like "17,18 Quinacridone (QC) derivative", "red-violet pigment", and "OTFT" are not material properties, so they are not included in the table.
